漢羅台文: 蔡英文執政的中華民國和外來政權有啥差別？
台羅: Tshuà Ing-bûn tsip-tsìng ê Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok hām guā-lâi tsìng-khuân ū siánn tsha-pia̍t?
台羅數字調: tshua3 ing1-bun5 tsip4-tsing3 e5 tiong1-hua5-bin5-kok4 ham7 gua7-lai5 tsing3-khuan5 u7 siann2 tsha1-piat8?
白話字: Chhòa Eng-bûn chip-chèng ê Tiong-hôa-bîn-kok hām gōa-lâi chèng-khoân ū siáⁿ chha-pia̍t?
